segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how oblivious the woman is to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just polishing that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink is overflowing, and the kids are stealing cookies right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a comedy of errors, and she’s the star of the show.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice the water or the kids’ antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically doing a balancing act on that stool, and she’s none the wiser.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet she’ll turn around and scream when she finally sees the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the outside looks so peaceful while the inside is pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is the kind of scene that makes me smile because it’s just so absurd.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone records this moment because it’s pure gold.
segments.speaker: PAR
